text: Carminatia alvarezii is a rare Mexican species of annual plants in the daisy family. It has been found only in the state of Guerrero.Turner, Billie Lee. 2009. Phytologia 91(1): 88-91; figures 1-2The International Plant Names Index == References == Category:Eupatorieae Category:Plants described in 2009 Category:Flora of Guerrero
title: Carminatia papagayana
